description: This file defines the ConversationAdapter class used to render chat messages in a RecyclerView, handling different message types like user, assistant, and system messages with specific layouts and styles.

classes.name: ConversationAdapter
classes.description: Adapter class for displaying chat messages in a RecyclerView with different layouts for user, assistant, and system messages.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Updates the adapter with a new list of messages and refreshes the view.

methods.name: getItemViewType
methods.description: Returns the type of the message at a given position based on its role.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates appropriate ViewHolder based on message type.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of messages.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds message data to the appropriate ViewHolder.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds message content to the TextView in each ViewHolder.
